00115 typedef struct RigEdge {
00116     struct RigEdge *next, *prev;
00117     float head[3], tail[3];
00118     float length;
00119     float angle; /* angle to next edge */
00120     float up_angle; /* angle between up_axis and the joint normal (defined as Previous edge CrossProduct Current edge */
00121     struct EditBone *bone;
00122     float up_axis[3];
00123 } RigEdge;

00144 typedef struct RigControl {
